title: Mahou no Princess Minky Momo: Yume no Naka no Rondo
synopsis: Minky Momo travels to an island where she finds a land of children and gets tangled up in an absurd, no-holds-barred standoff against the world's nations. Has "Dr. Strangelove" references.
related_anime: ['Mahou no Princess Minky Momo vs. Mahou no Tenshi Creamy Mami', 'Mahou no Princess Minky Momo']
